message.content: Yes, the authors include new assets in the form of the SCIENCEQA dataset, which they have curated and released. They provide a URL to access the data exploration tool at https://scienceqa.github.io/explore.html in the appendix section A.1 Data Collection.

Yes, the authors have curated and released a new dataset called SCIENCEQA. They include a URL in the appendix section for a data exploration tool that can be accessed at https://scienceqa.github.io/explore.html. The paper also mentions that the SCIENCEQA dataset will be available for non-commercial research purposes.

Yes, the authors mention the curated SCIENCEQA dataset and provide a URL to the data exploration tool in the appendix section A.1 Data Collection. The tool can be accessed at https://scienceqa.github.io/explore.html. Additionally, they discuss the creation of this dataset in detail in the main paper, making it a new asset released by the authors.
